content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EUS is guided by the following other documents:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM Regulations/Forms/EPAM Regulations.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions%2FEPAM%5FHardwareStandardsWIGLO%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hardware Standards\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – defines hardware equipment standards for purchase and provision to users.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM%20Regulations/Forms/EPAM%20Regulations.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions%2FEPAM%5FITHardwareTrackingWIGLO%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT Hardware Tracking\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – describes the process for managing the IT hardware assets at EPAM. It is aimed at supporting the regular lifecycle of the equipment to collect statistics for managing IT purchase, stock management, and hardware asset tracking.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM%20Regulations/Forms/EPAM%20Regulations.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions%2FEPAM%5FHardwareQualityControlCheckingWIGLO%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fpolicy%2FEPAM%20Regulations%2FWork%20Instructions%2FGlobal%20Work%20Instructions\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hardware Quality Control Checking\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – describes the actions that are to be fulfilled by Procurement IT Specialists and End User Services Engineers for checking hardware quality and accept hardware.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main tool that helps Engineers to maintain the Asset Management process is HPAM. The following pages will provide detailed information on it.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
